integration_patterns: API integrations for healthcare data exchange

evidence.claim: Cleverly + Associates utilizes AWS for scalable cloud infrastructure.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance in its healthcare data management solutions.
Integration with EHR systems using FHIR standards is mentioned.
They employ Google Cloud Platform for data processing needs.
HL7 compliance is part of their data exchange solutions.

icp.icp_reason: They focus on X12 healthcare data exchange and API integrations.
